meanings.definition: A small tree or shrub of the rose family, typically bearing white flowers and red berries.
meanings.sent1: The rowan tree in the garden has beautiful white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked some rowan berries to make jam.
meanings.sent3: The rowan tree and the apple tree had a friendly chat about their fruits.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the red berries of a rowan tree, bright and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The rowan tree stood out in the forest with its vibrant red berries.

meanings.definition: The red berry of the rowan tree.
meanings.sent1: She collected a handful of rowan berries for a nature project.
meanings.sent2: The rowan berry added a pop of color to the autumn landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel juggled rowan berries for fun.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks flushed as red as a rowan berry when he was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The rowan berry glistened in the sunlight like a tiny ruby.
